channel.title: Comments on: Injustice in the British Justice System?

item.title: By: protohedgehog
item.dc:creator: protohedgehog
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://fossilsandshit.com/injustice-in-the-british-justice-system/#comment-37">BrainLogic</a>.
Thankyou! It's difficult to get recognition on such a small blog though. I did send the article (with a few edits) to my local newspaper, but nothing ever became of it (that I'm aware of)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to BrainLogic.

Thankyou! It’s difficult to get recognition on such a small blog though. I did send the article (with a few edits) to my local newspaper, but nothing ever became of it (that I’m aware of)

item.title: By: BrainLogic
item.dc:creator: BrainLogic
item.description: At least, you spoke up by writing. Thank you for that. This very much needs to go viral.
item.content:encoded: At least, you spoke up by writing. Thank you for that. This very much needs to go viral.
